text: We’ll hear arguments next in 72-1465, Procunier against Martinez.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please this Court.
United States versus Savage, was it?
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
Do you think when a man talks to his lawyer, it’s monitored?
Don’t you say it was monitored.
But does the person know when he is being monitored?
By confidential, you mean oft an interview with his lawyer?
I think your time is up Mr. Collins.
